long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple tool for collecting (and naming) your favorite web tabs.
Simple to use:
- Just enter the name for the web tab (optionaly) and click "Catch URL" button,
- Click "Delete" button to delete selected tabs,
- Doubleclick "Delete" button to delete all collected tabs.
And... that's all, folks :)
